N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 131.22 - Insurance, undertakings and deposits

State Regulations

Permittees are subject to applicable provisions of Part 127
of this Title. Utilities are not eligible for participation in the department's
blanket policy. Protective public liability insurance must be provided as
required by section
127.1
of this Title, unless, with
respect to municipalities and public service corporations, an undertaking is
furnished in a form and amount acceptable to the department. Failure to
maintain such insurance or undertaking, or insurance required by the Workers'
Compensation Law immediately causes invalidation of a permit. Other than
specifically provided for by law, the department shall owe no duty or
obligation to any utility with respect to utility facilities within the
department's rights-of-way. Notes
